resources.string: Obtain permission to connect to a Wi-Fi network from the network owner before connecting. VzWiFiConnect generates the default WEP key for some wireless routers. Enter the SSID and press Generate to generate the WEP key, or if any WiFi is enabled and any valid networks are scanned, short-press a network to generate the WEP key, or long-press to generate the WEP key and attempt to connect. Please report issues to http://code.google.com/p/vzwificonnect/

Short press a network to generate the key. Long press a network to attempt to connect to it.
